title: Problem with lol (notebook),screen
body:
I have Samsung laptop : 
8gb ram,
Intel® Core™ i5-3210M,
AMD Radeon HD 7670M 1024MB GDDR3

and i have problems in lol ...
My screen flashing and i see loading screen..How to fix this? I have all drivers installed

i uploaded video on youtube,just watch : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3yfDAV7Zo7I&index=1&list=UUuraQSBWCwMsK29Jy8X1fLA
This noise in video is rain :D
Please help me!

replies.body:
Hey SRBDjape,

That's a pretty weird issue. For this kind of issue you should [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). For now, you should be able to play by switching to Borderless Windowed mode.
